Grace Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1944) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
Mukomberanwa bụ ọgbọ mbụ na-akpụ ihe ncha nke Shona art
Ọ bụ nwunye onye ama ama na ọgbọ mbụ bụ Nicholas Mukomberanwa
Ha abụọ nwetara ọzụzụ n'ịkpụ nkume ncha ma zụọ ụmụ ha n'otu ọrụ ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-akpụ ihe na Zimbabwe
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ụlọ ngosi gburugburu ụwa.
Ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa, bụ ndị a ma ama na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nne ụmụ nwoke Anderson, Lawrence Mukomberanwa, Tendai, Taguma, ụmụ nwanyị Netsai, na Ennica Mukomberanwa, na nwanne nne Nesbert Mukomberanwa, ha niile bụ ndị na-akpụ ihe.
